item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! I am Lerong, a programmer in her 20s and someone who also has a passion for life. This is the website where I would post my thoughts, my study record and life sharing occasionally. Here are the things to be expected: Pole dancing. I love both the pole tricks and exotic dances. Tales. My favorite one is The lord of the ring. Though I like it a lot but I am far from an expert in it.
